items.sentence: Tom said that he wasn\'t interested in meeting Mary.
Tom and Mary sat at a table for two near the window.
Tom and Mary stared at each other for a few moments.
Sorry, I\'m thirty minutes late because I overslept.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom would\'ve been happy here.
I\'m really very healthy even though I\'m very thin.
Did the doctor say it was OK for you to go swimming?
Did you have a birthday party on your last birthday?
Did you have any problem getting all your work done?
Did you know Tom was going to go to Boston tomorrow?
